Detailed Description

stmt Pure virtual base class - all statement classes inherit from this class except for class func_info

All language statements classes are derived from the stmt class the stmt class - contains members (stmt * prev, *next pointers to chain to other statements. It also contains line and filename information about the statement being parsed

Member Function Documentation

virtual void stmt::generate_code ( ostringstream &  quest_defns,
ostringstream &  program_code 
) [pure virtual]

generate_code(): Pure virtual functions takes 2 streams which as parameters code is written to both the streams the code in the quest_defns stream appears before the code in the program_code stream

Implemented in question, range_question, named_stub_question, expr_stmt, decl_stmt, cmpd_stmt, for_stmt, and if_stmt.
